casebody.data:
Gregory THOMAS, Appellant
v.
Tom CORBETT, et al., Governor of Pennsylvania, John E. Wetzel, et al., Secretary of Corrections, Shirley R. Moore Smeal, Deputy Secretary of Corrections, His Policy Executive Board Makers Sued in Their Individual Capacities and Official Capacities, Appellees No. 10 EAP 2019 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 17, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW , this 17 th day of July, 2019, Appellees' Motion to Quash Appeal is GRANTED, without prejudice to Appellant's ability to raise the claims therein on appeal from a final order of the Commonwealth Court. See United States Orgs. for Bankr. Alts., Inc. v. Dep't of Banking , 611 Pa. 370 , 26 A.3d 474 (2011).

Appellant's Motion for Appointment of Counsel is DISMISSED as moot.
